title: 820-00239 A1706 'Critical Update Required and no touchbar
message:
We've got a A1706 with no touchbar that is failing to'Critical update.
Also tested the board in a different housing and still the same error.

Not sure where to check next.

Just to add that the Macbook boots in safe mode

title: 820-00239 A1706 'Critical Update Required and no touchbar
message:
Any history available?
Check voltages and signals on both touchbar connectors.
Find proper test points on boardview.
Compare readibgs with good board, if possible.

title: 820-00239 A1706 'Critical Update Required and no touchbar
message:
I GET 5V ON PIN 22 PP5V_SO_T139   pin 21 1.8v
PIN 20 PP1V8_SOSW_DFR 1.1V           pin 19 1.1v
PIN 18 1.8V
PIN 16 1.8V
PIN 14 1.8V
PIN 2 dfr_touch_lid 0v

title: 820-00239 A1706 'Critical Update Required and no touchbar
message:
"PIN 20 PP1V8_SOSW_DFR 1.1V"
Are you sure?
As per schematic, pins 20 & 21 are tied together.

Check J4401 too...

title: 820-00239 A1706 'Critical Update Required and no touchbar
820-00239 A1706 'Critical Update Required and no touchbar
message:
Did you check with touchbar connected?
What about J4401?
